message:
SYSTEM: 03.Vocabularios-LD_v5.pdf: Página 10
Semantic Technologies in the Web of Data.  Red.es.   4th December 2012 
Ontology 
11 
 
 
•
An ontology is an engineering artifact, which provides:  
•
A set of terms 
•
A set of explicit assumptions regarding the intended meaning of 
the terms.  
• Almost always including concepts and their classification 
• Almost always including properties between concepts 
 
 
•
Shared understanding of a domain of interest  
 
•
Ontologies expressed in OWL or RDF(S), both based 
on RDF 
 
•
Tools: Protégé, NeOn Toolkit, Topbraid Composer, etc.
speaker: SYSTEM
